mainTechnologies.Title: Current Technologies
mainTechnologies.description: Here is a list of the technologies that I use most frequently.
tabletop.description: Desktop application that helps game masters maintain real-time combat information, as well as providing a robust NPC creation system.
tabletop.descriptionBoxes.devNotes.title: Developer Notes
tabletop.dialogue1: You join the queue at a crowded tavern...
tabletop.dialogue2: I want to talk to whoever is in front of us!
tabletop.dialogue3: No problem! <Generates a new unique character in one click>
tabletop.npcRange1: How he will treat the group in the first interaction:
tabletop.npcRange2: The difficulty the group will have in bargaining with him:
tabletop.npcRange3: How true he will be to his words:
footer.aboutMeText: Web-focused developer, passionate about exploring new technologies and creating creative and elegant solutions, always prioritizing performance.
footer.developmentText: This project is under constant development. I hope to see you back here in the future
footer.copyright: Â© 2025 | Planning, Design & Development Mady By - Pedro Vitor Miranda Lopes | All Rights Reserved
descriptionBoxes.box1.title: Main Features
descriptionBoxes.box1.text1: Side menu containing player and enemy information, allowing real-time data manipulation
descriptionBoxes.box1.text2: Complete list of D&D system skill checks
descriptionBoxes.box1.text3: Complete list of D&D skills, which change dynamically based on skill selection
descriptionBoxes.box1.text4: Button that allows you to automatically roll all players' initiatives
descriptionBoxes.box2.title: Character Creator
descriptionBoxes.box2.text1: Static Data: Robust database with character statistics from various models
descriptionBoxes.box2.text2: Organic Data: Character creator that allows you to create unique characteristics for characters at the press of a button, including: Behavioral Traits, Profession or Occupation, one unique characteristic and possible involvement with crime
